body_html:
Now i found the cause. If I remove the global_step=train_step when saving the saver, error will disappear.
So the reason should be train_step been wrongly run without feed_dict. It easily mislead developer wasting a lot of time checking the data-loading process.
Now I closed it. But i think this message of the issue is still useful to other developers.

body:
Now i found the cause. If I remove the global_step=train_step when saving the saver, error will disappear. 
So the reason should be train_step been wrongly run without feed_dict. It easily mislead developer wasting a lot of time checking the data-loading process.
Now I closed it. But i think this message of the issue is still useful to other developers.
